title: Saints stun Texans, Raiders win without AB, Week 1 overreactions (Football 9/10)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Monday Night Football slate which consisted of 2 games in Week 1. The guys dive into the surprising effort from the Raiders and how bad the Broncos might be (1:00), before analyzing the Saints thrilling victory over the Texans (15:00), which including more officiating mishaps and Houston's failure to protect Deshaun Watson. Will, Ryan, John and Sean then assign Week 1 overreactions including whether the Dolphins will win a game this season (36:00), if Dak Prescott will soon become the league's highest-paid player (41:00) and if a 1st-year coach could get fired in-season (43:00). Finally, an Andy Dalton bet you don't want to miss (49:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
